name: bugs.jqueryui.com
description: Static archive of the old bugs.jqueryui.com trac site, built with eleventy.

scripts.start: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx @11ty/eleventy --serve --quiet
scripts.debug: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=Eleventy* npx @11ty/eleventy
scripts.debugstart: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=Eleventy* npx @11ty/eleventy --serve --quiet
scripts.benchmark: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=Eleventy:Benchmark* npx @11ty/eleventy
scripts.testbuild: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx @11ty/eleventy && npm run searchindex
